title: Executive Order 7808-Power-Site Restoration No. 488, Oregon. Partial Revocation of Executive Order of December 12, 1917, Creating Power-Site Reserve No. 661
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by the act of June 25, 1910, ch. 421, 36 Stat. 847, as amended by the act of August 24, 1912, ch. 369, 37 Stat. 497, the Executive Order of December 12, 1917, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 661, is hereby revoked as to the following-described lands:
T. 10 S., R.. 1 E., sec. 1, lot 5.
T. 11 S., R.. 1 E.,      Sec. 17, SW¼SW¼;      Sec. 27, NE¼NE¼.
T. 10 S., R. 2 E.,      Sec. 15, S½;      Sec. 17, S½NE¼;      Sec. 23, S½N½ , and N½SE¼.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7808-Power-Site Restoration No. 488, Oregon. Partial Revocation of Executive Order of December 12, 1917, Creating Power-Site Reserve No. 661 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/371788
